summary: Relatively simple tweaks to make Werewolves (Beast Form) just a little bit stronger.
descriptionHtml:
Author: Thrae (generalmx)
Version: Beta v1

These are just some relatively simple tweaks to make Werewolves (Beast Form) just a little bit stronger.

There are multiple files so you can tweak your toughness to your choosing. Ones named similarly will overwrite each other\'s changes, so use only one of each. Otherwise all the files can be combined for best effect.

Damage Tweaks
Desc: Increases the unarmed damage while transformed as a Werewolf. Multiple ESPs, use only ONE.

WerewolfTweaksMoreDamageCurved.esp -- Increases damage curve so you\'re dealing 50% more damage at Level 50, 40% more at Level 40, 30% more at Level 30, etc.
WerewolfTweaksMoreDamage.esp -- Increases damage by 50% (all levels)

Beast Form Transformation Tweaks
Desc: Adds bonuses while you\'re transforming into a Werewolf so you can survive the transformation.

WerewolfTweaksTransformToughRegen.esp -- While transforming (for 15 seconds) increases Health by 200, Armor by 200, Magic Resist by 20, and allows 300% health regeneration

Totem Tweaks
Desc: Tweaks the various powers you can use while in Beast Form.

WerewolfTweaksFear.esp -- Increases maximum level of Howl of Terror (Fear) to 99 (untested)

Beast Form Tweaks
Desc: Additional bonuses while in Beast Form. Multiple ESPs, use only ONE.

WerewolfTweaks100Health_100AR.esp -- +100 Health, +100 Armor Rating
WerewolfTweaks100Health_100AR_10MR.esp -- +100 Health, +100 Armor Rating, +10 Magic Resist
WerewolfTweaks250Health.esp -- +250 Health
WerewolfTweaks250Health_200AR.esp -- +250 Health, +200 Armor Rating
WerewolfTweaks250Health_200AR_20MR.esp -- +250 Health, +200 Armor Rating, +20 Magic Resist
WerewolfTweaks350Health.esp -- +350 Health
WerewolfTweaks350Health_300AR.esp -- +350 Health, +300 Armor Rating
WerewolfTweaks350Health_300AR_30MR.esp -- +350 Health, +300 Armor Rating, +30 Magic Resist
WerewolfTweaks10MagicResist.esp -- +10 Magic Resist
WerewolfTweaks25MagicResist.esp -- +25 Magic Resist
WerewolfTweaks40MagicResist.esp -- +40 Magic Resist

Feeding Tweaks
Desc: Additional bonuses to feeding on corpses. Multiple ESPs, use only ONE.

WerewolfTweaksFeed75.esp -- Feeding restores 75 health
WerewolfTweaksFeed75HealthStamina.esp -- Feeding restores 75 health and stamina
WerewolfTweaksFeed100.esp -- Feeding restores 100 health
WerewolfTweaksFeed100HealthStamina.esp -- Feeding restores 100 health and stamina
WerewolfTweaksFeed150.esp -- Feeding restores 150 health
WerewolfTweaksFeed150HealthStamina.esp -- Feeding restores 150 health and stamina
WerewolfTweaksFeedRegen.esp -- Feeding allows 300% health regeneration for 15 seconds (untested)
WerewolfTweaksFeedToughBonus.esp -- Feeding restores 50 health, adds +100 Health and Armor for 15 seconds
WerewolfTweaksFeedToughBonus + Stam.esp -- Feeding restores 50 health and stamina, adds +100 Health and Armor for 15 seconds

By default NMM will activate these tweaks, which you can deactivate manually by changing plugins.txt:
WerewolfTweaks250Health.esp
WerewolfTweaksFeed75.esp
WerewolfTweaksMoreDamageCurved.esp
WerewolfTweaksTransformToughRegen.esp
WerewolfTweaksFear.esp

Changes:
Version 1b -- Added optional +Magic Resist only per request.
Version 1 -- Initial release.
author: Thrae
